TextView.android:text: KVSN Prasad: He heads Pometek solutions, a company that primarily deals in providing software solutions to customers, who are from around the world. His meticulous focus to detailing and his insistence on hard work has paid off, and Pometek solutions is a leading player in the software segment in Visakhapatnam. His company has recently gone into developing software for student parent interaction, thus making him the perfect social entrepreneur.
